title: Stonehenge
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,678 words, Level Z1 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1080L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     N and W
description: Over five thousand years old, the massive stones of Stonehenge draw thousands of visitors to the English countryside each year. Students will be fascinated to learn how the monument's ancient builders could have handled its heavy stones as well as why they may have decided to build it.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
